attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Engineering is a body currently consulted by Government.  Engineers have a great deal to offer if they are better enabled to assist and influence decision-making.  A Chief Engineering Adviser is needed to empower the UK Government to take a long-term, co-ordinated and sustainable approach to the planning of infrastructure; such as the energy, water, transport, waste, and the response to climate change.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "create a Chief Engineering Adviser, to empower the UK Government to take a long-term, co-ordinated and sustainable approach to infrastructure."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13020.asp
